# PED::IS_PED_SITTING_IN_VEHICLE

## Summary
Checks the ped is sitting the specified vehicle

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** ped
* **VEHICLE_INDEX** vehicle

## Returns
* **BOOL**

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Detect if ped is sitting in the specified vehicle
[True/False]
